title: An Amazing Cocktail Sauce Recipe
description:
http://blog.bedbathandbeyond.com/bbb-recipe/an-amazing-cocktail-sauce-recipe/
Sam the Cooking Guy's cocktail sauce is so versatile, it can be used on cooked shrimp, fries, hot dogs, egg rolls or a Bloody Mary.

asset.author: Bed Bath & Beyond
asset.hookText:
http://blog.bedbathandbeyond.com/bbb-recipe/an-amazing-cocktail-sauce-recipe/
Sam the Cooking Guy's cocktail sauce is so versatile, it can be used on cooked shrimp, fries, hot dogs, egg rolls or a Bloody Mary.

transcripts: You're only a handful of ingredients away from a tremendous cocktail sauce. Start with ketchup and add prepared horseradish, lemon juice, couple shakes of Worcestershire, fresh ground pepper, and hot sauce. Mix well and serve with cooked shrimp. Too obvious? I figured. So how about with fries instead of plain ketchup? Or on a hot dog, even with egg rolls. What about adding to a block of cream cheese with some crab and serving with crackers? And I couldn't end without suggesting this amazing cocktail sauce added to a Bloody Mary is just, well, crazy good.
